full_summary:

## Procurement Method

## Selection Criteria

## Contracting Entity

## Contracting Entity Contact
Tamara Bennett
tenders@nserc-crsng.gc.ca
(343) 263-1961

## Tender Description
The objective of this service request is to support the decommissioning of the classic ASP technology currently in use as the technological framework for the NSERC Corporate Website and replace it with a cloud-based instance of Drupal WxT.

Bidders must submit a bid for all resource categories. The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.
